text.section:
This title does not prohibit a licensee or permit holder from:
employing a certified public accountant licensed by another state or a foreign country; or
listing that individual as a certified public accountant, if the individual qualifies for a practice privilege under § 2-321 of this title.

The Board shall adopt regulations that specify the language of the disclosure statement relating to exemption from peer review that is required to be included in a compilation of a financial statement prepared under subsection (a)(3)(iii)2 of this section.
